product.name: SUSE_SLES
product.vendor: SUSE LINUX Products GmbH, Nuernberg, Germany

product-list.product: 0x7ffdb538e948SUSE Linux Enterprise offers a comprehensive suite of products built on a single code base. The platform addresses business needs from the smallest thin-client devices to the world’s most powerful high-performance computing and mainframe servers. SUSE Linux Enterprise offers common management tools and technology certifications across the platform, and each product is enterprise-class.
